name: Sullivan et ux., Appellants, v. Thurner

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
parties: Sullivan et ux., Appellants, v. Thurner.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Maurice A. Nernberg, Jr., with him Nernberg & Nernberg, for appellants.
Dale Oleland, with him Oleland, Hurtt and Witt, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sullivan et ux., Appellants, v. Thurner.
Argued March 12, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
reargument refused August 2, 1974.
Maurice A. Nernberg, Jr., with him Nernberg & Nernberg, for appellants.
Dale Oleland, with him Oleland, Hurtt and Witt, for appellee.
July 1, 1974:
